Song.title: Who Is Like Our God
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Eric Grover © 2001 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: The [C]Lord is not our equal, He doesn’t [G/B]need the help of man Who could [Am]ever give Him counsel Who could [F]ever stop His sovereign plan Though [C]men may boast of wisdom, and be [G/B]filled with pride within Who is [Am]bold enough to answer When his [F]Maker comes to question [F2]him
Verse 2: Though [C]rulers rise against Him, the [G/B]King of Heaven laughs He re[Am]bukes them in His anger, and [F]terrifies them in His wrath He [C]punishes the wicked, pours [G/B]judgment out on sin Yet this [Am]Champion of Justice Is a [F]Savior if you call on [F2]Him
Chorus: And we call on the [Am]name{,} [G]of the holy [Em]sovereign [F]Lord The [C]King of [G]all the [F]earth And we hope in the [Am]pow’r{,} [G]of His awesome [Em]mighty [F]hand We [C]tremble [G]at His [F2]word, Who is like our [Am G | Em F | Am G | F]God
Verse 3: The [C]heavens sound with thunder, as His [G/B]majesty is shown The [Am]four and twenty elders{,} fall [F]down and worship at His throne His [C]eyes are flames of fire, and His [G/B]face is like the sun He’s the [Am]Alpha and Omega The [F]One who was and is to [F2]come
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 the lord is not our equal he doesnt need the help of man who could ever give him counsel who could ever stop his sovereign plan though men may boast of wisdom and be filled with pride within who is bold enough to answer when his maker comes to question him verse 2 though rulers rise against him the king of heaven laughs he rebukes them in his anger and terrifies them in his wrath he punishes the wicked pours judgment out on sin yet this champion of justice is a savior if you call on him chorus and we call on the name of the holy sovereign lord the king of all the earth and we hope in the powr of his awesome mighty hand we tremble at his word who is like our god verse 3 the heavens sound with thunder as his majesty is shown the four and twenty elders fall down and worship at his throne his eyes are flames of fire and his face is like the sun hes the alpha and omega the one who was and is to come
